# G02.ME JSON API

= Introduction =

Most G02.ME functionality is available to programmers through a JSON/Javascript API.  Most of the URL's that are supported by the user-interface have a JSON-equivalent request.

All requests are of the form:

{{{
http://g02.me/...?callback=MyCallback
}}}

to which the response will look like:

{{{
MyCallback({status:"OK", ...});
}}}

Static requests can be inserted in a web page via:

{{{
<script>
function MyCallback(obj)
{
    ... your code here ...
}
</script>
<script src="http://g02.me/...?callback=MyCallback"></script>
}}}
